Name: Sex On The Beach
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice wheel.
SHAKE first 3 ingredients (the 'beach' part) with ice.
SHAKE the last 3 ingredients (the 'sex' part) with ice.
STRAIN into glass to sit on top of the 'beach' base layer.
Serve with stirrer and instruct drinker to mix layers together before drinking.
Review: Sweet fruitiness masks the alcohol in this easy-drinking, long cocktail. "Sex" is associated with red (e.g.red light district) and is represented in this drink in the form of vodka, cranberry juice, and black raspberry liqueur. These 'sexy' ingredients sit atop the sandy yellow "beach"– consisting of peach schnapps, orange juice, and pineapple juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Sex On The Beach contains 253 calories
